company.name: NYONair
company.info: NYONair is aerial/helicopter service company focusing on aerial photography experiences.

company.name: ShopKeep
company.info: ShopKeep is a software development company working on a point of sale application for iOS devices that’s being used by over 20,000 small businesses.

achievements: I’m the lead developer for ShopKeep’s marketing site, www.shopkeep.com.
I also manage and maintain their ecommerce site, shop.shopkeep.com.
I developed the front-end of their gift card micro-site, www.ecardsystems.com/shopkeep.
I developed the front-end of their lead capture micro-site, www.possoftwareguide.com/find-your-pos.
I designed and developed landing pages.
I developed the new blog, http://www.shopkeep.com/blog.

company.name: Magnet Media
company.info: Magnet Media Films is a content marketing solutions industry leader who created stunning videos for clients such as Google, Microsoft and Good Technology.

achievements: I assisted the Art Director with Magnet Media’s personal branding as well as client projects.
I created visual assets for presentations and other marketing materials.
I redesigned and developed their marketing website.

company.name: Sign Facility
company.info: Sign Facility is a printing and signage company in downtown Jersey City with clients including Carlo’s Bakery, Mack Cali and John Hancock.

achievements: I was responsible for the design, prepress, production and production of the prints.
I also handled the digital press printers, laser cutter, vinyl cutter, and the flatbed printer for oversized printing.
I created personalized client print templates using HTML and CSS with a content management system called Online Printing Solutions owned by Electronics For Imaging.
